name: FileUploadSkill
description: A skill to upload files to Azure Blob Storage and invoke Azure Cognitive Search indexers.

definition.description: Upload files to Azure Blob Storage.

inputs.name: fileName
inputs.description: The name of the file to be uploaded.

inputs.name: fileType
inputs.description: The type of the file (e.g., txt, csv, png, jpg, pdf).

inputs.name: fileSize
inputs.description: The size of the file in bytes.

outputs.name: uploadStatus
outputs.description: The status of the file upload (e.g., success or error).

definition.description: Invoke the Azure Cognitive Search indexer after uploading files.

outputs.name: indexerStatus
outputs.description: The status of the indexer invocation (e.g., success or error).
